headerDisplay: The **Homebridge Yamaha Home** plugin allows you to control your Yamaha Receiver HomeKit.

play_volume.title: Play Volume
play_volume.description: Sets the volume when turning on. Default: -48

setMainInputTo.title: Main Input
setMainInputTo.description: Sets the input when turning on.

show_input_name.title: Show Input Name
show_input_name.description: Creates a button to display the selected input. Default: 'no'.

manual_addresses.title: Manual Addresses
manual_addresses.description: Manual IP addresses for Yamaha receivers.

expected_devices.title: Expected Devices
expected_devices.description: Maximum number of accessories created. Default: 100.

discovery_timeout.title: Discovery Timeout
discovery_timeout.description: Time to stay in discovery mode. Default: 30 seconds.

radio_presets.title: Radio Presets
radio_presets.description: Create a switch for each radio preset. Default: false.

preset_num.title: Preset Numbers
preset_num.description: Names the switch the preset number or frequency. Default: false.

zone_controllers_only_for.title: Zone Controllers Only For
zone_controllers_only_for.description: List of zone names for which accessories will be created.

zone_name_map.title: Zone Name Map
zone_name_map.description: Map of old zone names to new zone names.

party_switch.title: Party Switch
party_switch.description: Enable Party Mode Switch. Default: not set.

spotify.title: Spotify Buttons
spotify.description: Enable Spotify control buttons. Default: false.

nozones.title: No Zones
nozones.description: Do not create an accessory per zone. Default: false.
